Livonia.Eloise (psychiatric hospital):
Eloise was a large complex located in Westland, Michigan. The name came from the post office on the grounds which opened July 20, 1894 and was named after Eloise Dickerson Davock, daughter of Detroit's postmaster.
It operated from 1839 to early 1982 and started out as a poor house and farm but developed into an asylum and hospital.
